title: ** User Logs into the System
preconditions: User is on the login page: https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User has access to the login credentials: tomsmith/SuperSecretPassword!
main_flow: User enters username (tosmith) and password (SuperSecretPassword!) into the corresponding input fields.
System validates the entered credentials against the database.
a. If validation is successful, proceed to step 5.
b. If validation fails, display an error message and return to step 1.
5. User is now logged in and can access the secure area.
a. If validation fails, display an error message, clear the input fields, and return to step 1.
postconditions: If the login was successful, the user is now logged in and can access the secure area.
The system logs the successful login event.
